English: She will visit her grandparents next week.
French: Elle visitera ses grands-parents la semaine prochaine.

English: The summer season is coming soon.
I will not attend the party next Friday.
French: Je ne serai pas présent à la fête demain.

English: We always have a barbecue on weekends.
French: Nous organisons toujours un barbecue le week-end.

English: The month of December is festive.
French: Le mois de décembre est festif.

English: Could you tell me the date tomorrow?
French: Pourrais-tu me dire la date demain ?

English: The autumn season is my favorite.
Let's meet at the café this Sunday.
